message_1:
Using frequency analysis, determine the most common letter in the following message: 

"ETAOIN SHRDLU" 

Hint: The most frequent letter in the English language occurs approximately 13% of the time.
message_2:
To determine the most common letter in the message "ETAOIN SHRDLU", we will count the occurrences of each letter and calculate their frequencies.

E - 1
T - 1
A - 1
O - 1
I - 1
N - 1
S - 1
H - 1
R - 1
D - 1
L - 1
U - 1

There are 12 letters in the message, and each letter occurs only once. Therefore, each letter has a frequency of 1/12, or approximately 8.33%. Since no letter occurs more frequently than the others, there is no most common letter in this message.
